As products grow, it gets harder to keep their docs simple and intuitive. @Netlify's docs team is determined to keep ours as useful and useable as possible. And you can help. Use Netlify? Got 10 minutes to tell us your priorities with a card sort? https://t.co/Ey9F0Lq4Ia ❤️
